title: Retire an Old Asset
description: A piece of machinery has reached the end of its life and needs to be formally retired and removed from the asset register.

tasks.description: Find the asset in the maintenance management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the correct asset record.

tasks.description: Verify that there are no open work orders or outstanding PMs for the asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there is no pending work on the asset.

tasks.description: Change the asset's status to 'Retired' and enter the date of disposal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retires the asset, removing it from active service and maintenance plans.
